metadata.Title: CVE-2012-0320 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Movable Type before 4.38, 5.0x before 5.07, and 5.1x before 5.13 allowsremote attackers to take control of sessions via unspecified vectorsrelated to the (1) commenting feature and (2) community script.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-0320` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

movabletype-opensource - 5.1.4+dfsg-1
movabletype-plugin-core - 5.1.4+dfsg-1
movabletype-plugin-zemanta - 5.1.4+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: movabletype-opensource package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.1.4+dfsg-1').
